2.3.0.en: App upgraded to Homey SDK version 3

2.2.2.en: Improved discovery for energy meter devices

2.2.1.en: Improved discovery for energy meter devices

2.1.6.en: Fixed PVOutput bug which caused missing reports

2.1.5.en: Eliminated a bug which caused app to crash

2.1.4.en: Filter out negative daily yield values

2.1.3.en: More accurate daily yield reported to PVOutput.org

2.1.2.en: Added manually calculated daily yield for inverters that miss this functionality

2.1.1.en: Added MPP A and B power capabilities to the summary device

2.1.0.en: Added MPP A and B power capabilities to Inverter devices that supports it

2.0.9.en: Added frequency capability to Energy Meter / Home Manager devices

2.0.8.en: Filter out unknown condition status for inverter device type. Added Swedish language support

2.0.6.en: You can now report your inverter(s) status to PVOutput.org

2.0.5.en: Enhanced energy meter readings to use SMA obis identifiers

2.0.4.en: Support for SB AV-40 inverters. New inverter condition trigger.

2.0.3.en: Enhanced wizard for adding inverters which allows to manually add the IP address of the inverter if auto-discovery doesn't find any inverters.

2.0.1.en: Battery added to Summary device. Please delete the Energy Summary device and add it again to see new capability. Load balancing feature added Energy Meter.

2.0.0.en: New device discovery method for inverters. Using Speedwire Device Discovery, the local network is queried for SMA inverters. And tons more ...
